DESCRIPTION: Mute a member in the server. Enter a duration to mute them for a period of time
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}mute @member 25m reason** ~ Mutes the mentioned user for 25 minutes.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: Muting a user will hide all channels
ALIASES: Mute does not have any aliases.
USER_TOO_LOW: Your highest role is not high enough to mute this member.
BOT_TOO_LOW: The bots role is not high enough to mute this member.
ALREADY_MUTED: This member already has the **muted** role.
SUCCESS: You have successfully permanently muted {{member}} because: {{reason}}.
TIMED_SUCCESS: You have successfully muted {{member}} for {{duration}} because: {{reason}}.
GUILDMEMBERADD_MUTED: A muted member rejoined, they are muted again.
GUILDMEMBERADD_MUTE_FAILED: âš  A member has joined the server who was muted when he left. I was not able to mute them automatically when they rejoined so I am notifying the moderators. Please mute this member with the mute command.
PERMISSION: Mute Role Auto Disable Send Messages On Channel Creation.
MUTE_ROLE_REASON: Edited permissions to hide access to this channel for mute role.
NEED_MUTE_ROLE: The mute role was not able to be found. You must first set up the mute system, with the **setmute** command.
NEED_REASON: You must provide a reason in order to mute the user.
TITLE: {{username}}, you have been **MUTED** from [{{guildName}}]
NEED_USER: You did not provide a user to mute.
